comment._content: What is the animal in the picture on the front row?

comment.author: 7140796@N05
comment._content: Epilsk - It's a lap dog.  The cameras at the time required long exposures - people needed to sit still while the shot was taken.  The dog clearly couldn't :)

comment.author: 29221908@N03
comment._content:
wow!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! can you imagine what these people would have thought if they had been told that in a hundred years time the whole world would see the picture, thanks to tecnology. At the time they were just inventing the light! In 1877 electric lights were only used by a few people!
... they would have certainly asked: what is technology??
